name: New Lands
description:
Try out the role of a beginner landowner. Grow wheat and build mills and mines. Restore your very own mansion. The deeper you delve into your new lands, the more exciting your jobs will be and the harder they’ll be to complete.

Restore your new lands and become a successful landowner in new time management game!

- locations full of beautiful views
- an uplifting story
- varied quests
- exciting gameplay
- beautiful graphics
- calming music
- helpful guide
